title: Rough Waters
description: High waves bombard the ship

B.action_taken: Brave the waters

title: Approaching Storm
description: The crew sees dark clouds on the horizon

B.action_taken: Alter ship's course

title: Caught in Storm
description: The ship is caught in a sudden storm

B.action_taken: Abandon ship

title: Crew Mutiny
description: Crew rebels against the captain

A.action_taken: Ship's officers join in on the rebellion

B.action_taken: Ship's officers come to captain's aid

title: Navigation Error
description: A miscalculation results in a navigation error

B.action_taken: Attempt to follow the original course

title: Fire on the Ship
description: A fire in the galley spreads towards the gunpowder magazine

A.action_taken: Form bucket brigade and throw barrels of gunpowder overboard

B.action_taken: Sail upwind to blow flames away from ship and attempt to smother the fire

title: Food Shortage
description: Food spoils due to saltwater contamination and heat

B.action_taken: Search for land and try to resupply

title: Water Shortage
description: Fresh water spills from water casks due to improper storage and rough seas

B.action_taken: Return to pirate haven to resupply

title: Smallpox Outbreak
description: Smallpox begins to spread among the crew from an infected crew member

B.action_taken: Force infected crew to abandon ship using the ship's boats

title: Foggy Waters
description: A dense fog envelops the ship

B.action_taken: Drop anchor and wait for fog to clear

title: Ship runs aground
description: Ship strikes a barrier reef in shallow water

A.action_taken: Attempt to free the ship using anchors and ropes

B.action_taken: Use the ship's longboat to search for nearby land

title: Sudden Squall
description: A small, unexpected squall suddenly hits the ship

A.action_taken: Drop the sails to reduce wind resistance and stabilize the ship

B.action_taken: Adjust the course to angle the ship into the wind and ride it out

title: Unfamiliar Waters
description: The ship enters an unknown and dangerous part of the sea

A.action_taken: Carefully navigate using the stars and compass

B.action_taken: Risk a faster route through uncharted waters

title: Pirate Encounter
description: Another pirate ship is spotted on the horizon

B.action_taken: Make contact with ship and form alliance to attack a coastal city

title: Rogue Wave
description: A massive, unpredictable wave strikes the ship

A.action_taken: Main the pumps and bail out the water

B.action_taken: Abandon the ship and attempt to escape in the ship's boats

title: Whale carcass
description: Crew sights a whale carcass floating on the surface of the water

A.action_taken: Collect and harvest the carcass for oil, blubber, and baleen

B.action_taken: Ignore the whale carcass and continue with your journey

title: Sinking Ship Sighted
description: A nearby ship is seen sinking, potentially in need of help

A.action_taken: Rescue survivors from the sinking ship

B.action_taken: Avoid the ship and continue sailing

title: Man overboard
description: Crew member working the sails loses balance and falls into the sea below

A.action_taken: Deploy jolly boat to rescue crew member

B.action_taken: Use ropes and boat hook to try to rescue crew member

title: Violation of Pirate Code
description: Crewmember commits an infraction against pirate code

B.action_taken: Set crewmember adrift in one of the ship's small boats

title: Calm Sea
description: The sea becomes unexpectedly calm and still

A.action_taken: Take advantage of the calm for rest and repairs

B.action_taken: Use the opportunity to move the ship further along the course

title: Treasure Hunt
description: The crew discovers a map leading to hidden treasure on a remote island.

A.action_taken: Find and recover treasure, gaining gold

B.action_taken: The treasure is a trap, losing supplies and morale

title: Deserted Island
description: The ship comes across an uninhabited island with potential resources.

A.action_taken: Gather fresh water, food, and supplies

B.action_taken: The island is barren, with nothing to gather but frustration

title: Lost Crew Member
description: A crew member goes missing after a shore excursion.

A.action_taken: Successfully locate and return the crew member

B.action_taken: The crew member is lost for good, lowering morale

title: Shipwrecked Goods
description: A shipwreck is found on the shore with salvageable goods.

A.action_taken: Salvage valuable goods, including food and materials

B.action_taken: The wreck is unstable, causing injury or damage to supplies

title: Pirates' Hideout
description: The crew stumbles upon an old pirate hideout with goods to steal.

B.action_taken: The hideout is guarded, resulting in a dangerous encounter

title: Lost in the Jungle
description: The crew gets lost in a thick jungle while searching for resources.

A.action_taken: Find a safe path out, gaining provisions and morale

B.action_taken: Spend extra time lost, reducing morale and food supply

title: Coastal Harvest
description: The crew harvests fish, seaweed, or other coastal resources.

A.action_taken: Gain abundant food for the crew

B.action_taken: The harvest yields poor results, providing minimal food

title: Trade with Locals
description: The crew meets locals on a nearby island and tries to trade.

A.action_taken: Secure a good trade, acquiring valuable items or provisions

B.action_taken: The locals are untrustworthy, scamming the crew

title: Forbidden Temple
description: The crew finds an ancient temple rumored to hold riches.

A.action_taken: Explore and recover treasures without triggering traps

B.action_taken: Activate traps or curses, losing provisions and morale

title: Desert Crossing
description: The crew navigates through a desert in search of an oasis or supply.

A.action_taken: Successfully cross, finding an oasis and fresh supplies

B.action_taken: Exhaust the crew, leading to dehydration and morale loss

title: Pirate Hunter
description: A bounty hunter has caught wind of the crew's hideout and is actively searching for them.

A.action_taken: The pirate hunter fails to find you. The crew avoids detection.

B.action_taken: The pirate hunter gathers information, leading authorities to your location.

title: Tavern Informant
description: A crew member hears whispers about an informant selling pirate whereabouts for gold.

A.action_taken: You bribe the informant to keep quiet, maintaining secrecy.

B.action_taken: The informant reveals your location to the authorities.

title: Spy Network
description: A local spy has been gathering information about your crew and plans to alert the authorities.

A.action_taken: The spy is caught and silenced before any word gets out.

B.action_taken: The spy successfully contacts the authorities, leading them to your hideout.

title: Captured at the Market
description: Crew members get recognized in a bustling market or village square. The authorities are alerted.

A.action_taken: You manage to blend in with the crowd and escape unnoticed.

B.action_taken: You’re surrounded by authorities and forced to flee.

title: Search Party
description: A naval search party is dispatched to find and capture you. They are scouring the coastline.

A.action_taken: The search party misses your hideout entirely.

B.action_taken: The search party locates your hideout, forcing you to move.

title: Betrayed by a Local
description: A local villager betrays the crew in exchange for gold.

A.action_taken: The local is apprehended before they can reach the authorities.

B.action_taken: The authorities are informed, and they begin a manhunt for your crew.

title: Pirate Haven Raid
description: Authorities raid a known pirate haven in search of crews.

A.action_taken: You manage to escape before the raid begins.

B.action_taken: The crew is caught during the raid and forced to surrender or flee.

title: Rumor at the Dock
description: Pirates are spotted at the docks by a merchant crew who’s eager to profit from your location.

A.action_taken: You bribe the merchant crew to stay quiet.

B.action_taken: The merchant crew reports you, and the authorities are on their way.

title: Naval Patrol Arrival
description: A nearby naval patrol is on high alert and combing coastal towns for pirate crews.

A.action_taken: The patrol doesn’t spot your crew, allowing you to slip away unnoticed.

B.action_taken: The patrol comes close to your hideout and your crew must flee immediately.

title: Public Outing
description: A pirate captain gets publicly recognized by a former associate who now works for the authorities.

A.action_taken: You avoid detection and make a quick escape before things escalate.

B.action_taken: The associate identifies you to the authorities, and your crew is surrounded.

title: Merchant Ambush
description: A lone merchant ship sails nearby with minimal escort.

B.action_taken: Let it pass

title: Rival Pirates
description: A rival pirate crew challenges you in open waters.

B.action_taken: Attempt to flee

title: Port Blockade
description: A port is under blockade by enemy forces.

B.action_taken: Wait it out

title: Naval Escort
description: You spot a cargo ship being protected by a naval escort.

B.action_taken: Trail them for later

title: Night Raid
description: A sleeping crew lies anchored and unaware of your ship.

B.action_taken: Fire cannons from afar

title: Hostile Boarding
description: An enemy ship attempts to board your vessel during a storm.

B.action_taken: Evade using the storm

title: Smuggler Standoff
description: You cross paths with smugglers guarding a secret shipment.

B.action_taken: Try to negotiate

title: Surprise Cannon Fire
description: You're ambushed by a hidden shore battery while sailing close to land.

B.action_taken: Retreat to deeper water

title: Dueling Captains
description: Another pirate captain challenges yours to a one-on-one duel.

B.action_taken: Refuse and prepare battle

title: Outgunned
description: You spot a heavily armed ship carrying valuable cargo.

B.action_taken: Attempt a stealth approach

title: Marooned Mutineers
description: You find crew marooned after a failed mutiny.

B.action_taken: Leave them behind

title: Dockside Ambush
description: Rival pirates lie in wait at a secluded dock.

B.action_taken: Flee and regroup

title: Raided Outpost
description: A coastal outpost has been sacked—survivors request help.

B.action_taken: Ignore the request

title: Mercenary Offer
description: Mercenaries offer their services for a price.

B.action_taken: Decline and risk combat alone

title: Escaped Prisoners
description: Escaped naval prisoners offer to join your crew.

B.action_taken: Refuse and send them away

title: Coastal Raid
description: A small seaport town lies vulnerable to attack.

B.action_taken: Sneak in to quietly steal goods

title: Sabotaged Supplies
description: Saboteurs have poisoned part of your provisions.

B.action_taken: Discard and replace supplies

title: Siege at Sea
description: You're caught between two warring ships exchanging fire.

B.action_taken: Lay low and wait it out

title: Captain’s Challenge
description: A crewmember questions your leadership and demands a vote.

B.action_taken: Allow the vote

title: Stolen Map
description: Another crew tries to steal your treasure map.

B.action_taken: Let them have it
